transArray.content: The room is small, but the equipment is very advanced, and the whole is modern and warm. The location is extremely good, you can take Line 10 and Capital Airport Line in minutes, and the nearby business district is also very mature. I personally think it is very suitable for business travelers. Here I would also like to mention their breakfast, which is a combination of Chinese and Western, very professional. The hotel as a whole is very energetic, and the service attitude of the staff is also very good
